title: LMS Utilization Competency Development Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Teaching Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service or In-Service Teachers: Developing Social Studies Project Capabilities Using LMS in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform technical support request procedures within the LMS with 90% accuracy.
Learners can identify three factors inhibiting LMS usage and propose solutions based on the extended TAM model.
Learners can complete projects in a PBL environment using only smartphones to access LMS collaboration tools (e.g., bulletin boards, file sharing).
Learners can achieve a score of 4.0/5.0 or higher on the LMS self-efficacy survey.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
